description:
Tapp was a dungeon guard in Michina during the ancient times. He guarded the cell that Damos, Ash, Dawn and Brock were kept in. He didn`t believe Damos was a bad person but he was under orders from Marcus to watch them.
When Pichu arrived with the key to the cell, Tapp didn`t do anything to stop Damos and Ash from escaping. He followed them into the main hall to see what was happening.
name: Tapp
